Reviews.Title: Dont bother
Reviews.Author: J. Brand "jerk"
Reviews.Content: After sticking on windows/doors, these stickers faded after only a few days exposed to sunlight. Save your money and get some better-quality ones.

Reviews.Title: a little more piece of mind
Reviews.Author: JMB
Reviews.Content: Some might call me paranoid, some might call me protective. I like to think of myself as intelligent. As I do not really feel like dropping oodles of cash on a REAL whole house surveillance system I figured these decals might deter any potential morons from attempting a break in. When I received these stickers I was impressed by the quality of them. I have put them next to the existing security companies decals on my home (a real monitoring company)and they look very legit. I'm thinking I might purchase four fake security cameras as well with blinking LED light (I believe the package is about $25 on amazon from the same vendor - looks like there are solid reviews on those as well).I would recommend this inexpensive piece of mind - not really much that can be lost with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Faded
Reviews.Author: cora jameson
Reviews.Content: The big sign is ok but the little stickers faded very fast I had to purchase new one's. Started fading in less than a week.

Reviews.Title: CHEAP STICKERS
Reviews.Author: Lydia Herbert
Reviews.Content: TWO MONTHS AFTER I PURCHASED THEM THEY ARE FADED AND NOW THEY DO NOT EVEN SERVE A FUNCTION.  PRODUCE BETTER QUALITY STICKERS PLEASE.....IF THEY ARE NOT MEANT FOR WINDOWS OR OUTSIDE APPLICATIONS, STATE THAT IN YOUR PRODUCT DESCRIPTION.

Reviews.Title: not very sticky
Reviews.Author: VirtualNeighbor "~miked"
Reviews.Content: The stickers keep peeling off the glass.  Every day I push the stickers down again.  I can easily add another adhesive - but one reason I bought "stickers" was so that they would stick.  Other than not being sticky, they are well made (not hand cut or hacked looking).

Reviews.Title: I don't know
Reviews.Author: Adrian
Reviews.Content: Large warning sign is okay against the Suns UV light.  The small ones are useless, after a couple of weeks they faded to white. The sun UV burn the color completely off.

Reviews.Title: video
Reviews.Author: Sandy Tubbs
Reviews.Content: The stickers do not hold up under the harsh sun rays.  They fade easily and peel.  Any moisture and they are worthless

Reviews.Title: Easy to install.
Reviews.Author: NShorter
Reviews.Content: Does the job - I wanted some signs to put up around our property and these are professional and easy to install.

Reviews.Title: Junk
Reviews.Author: Mr C
Reviews.Content: These look really fake so they are not something I would display. I threw the them out. I would not recommend buying these.

Reviews.Title: No break in necessary
Reviews.Author: Priestly Thompson "Priestly Thompson"
Reviews.Content: Great safety mechanism... This has given thiefs a new detour not to break in without being discovered. Thanks again... Will need more.

Reviews.Title: VERY POOR quality it fade in three week
Reviews.Author: Eli Mirza
Reviews.Content: VERY POOR quality it fade in a sun light or outside raining area.. after three week i hardly see the sign..

Reviews.Title: evrything is good thankyou
Reviews.Author: max
Reviews.Content: evrything is good thank you all r in good condishen works good for me thank you agine ibuy it agine

Reviews.Title: waste of $$$
Reviews.Author: vicious1538
Reviews.Content: The large one is fine but the smaller stickers fade within days!!!  What a disappointment.  Don't waste your money.  Buy another product.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: C. Uribe
Reviews.Content: I bought these labels many times for my properties, I have used only the big ones and they are really great.

Reviews.Title: What can I say
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: What can I say it's a sticker you put it up and hope it works. Nice bright colors and okay size.

Reviews.Title: Don't wast your money
Reviews.Author: Henderson Johnson Sr
Reviews.Content: I installed the adhesive stickers on windows around the house and they are fading, only the large on on the inside is doing okay.

Reviews.Title: small stickers are worthless
Reviews.Author: tresrazas
Reviews.Content: the small stickers are  completely worthlessthey fade completely in the sunleaving one with a sticker that is bleachedwhite with no messagefortunately i have the larger side out of the sun

Reviews.Title: waste of money
Reviews.Author: DSWM
Reviews.Content: They faded after a week.  Don't throw away your money on these.  These are not cheap, they are junk IMHO.

Reviews.Title: Dont waste your money!
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: I got these signs to put on my window and within 2 weeks the sun faded them out very bad to the point you cannot even read what it says now.  Dont waste your money!

Reviews.Title: They work
Reviews.Author: Patrick Egan
Reviews.Content: They get the point across, there is a camera.  They will weather storms; I really don't have any more to say to submit this review.  They stick?

Reviews.Title: not last even a month
Reviews.Author: Lduarte
Reviews.Content: Decals not last even a month  when exposed to the sunlight...I put them in the window of my shop and did not work...

Reviews.Title: Not easily removed
Reviews.Author: I. Dencker "Tech Geek"
Reviews.Content: I bought these hoping that they were the static cling type.  Instead, when you try to remove them, they tear and leave sticky residue on the glass  -not easily removed at all...

Reviews.Title: Warning Signs
Reviews.Author: James  D. North
Reviews.Content: They are doing what they are suppose to do, is telling people that we have up and running twenty-four a day. They are do the job very well. I recommend  these video cctv stickers. Jim in Ohio.

Reviews.Title: Poor Quality..
Reviews.Author: judith aulabaugh
Reviews.Content: Waste of money.  Backing on the larger stickers is extremely difficult to remove and it does not adherewell to surfaces.

ProductInfo.Features:
These Decals can be applied to any smooth surface
These signs are your first line of defense against criminals
This is the quick, easy way to warn criminals that they are being watched
Easily posted and removed
Size: 4 of 3"x 2" and 1 of 11.5"x8.3" stickers
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 5 Pack of Security Warning Signs Stickers Decals for CCTV Video Surveillance Camera System CLN
